name: gamess
description: meta info used by the gamess parser, all names are expected to start with x_gamess

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_alpha_eigenvalues_values
metaInfos.description: values of eigenenergies for alpha MOs

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_atom_positions
metaInfos.description: Initial positions of all the atoms, in Cartesian coordinates.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_atom_positions_initial
metaInfos.description: Initial positions of all the atoms, in Cartesian coordinates.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_atom_x_coord
metaInfos.description: x coordinate for the atoms

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_atom_x_coord_initial
metaInfos.description: x coordinate for the atoms of the initial geometry

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_atom_y_coord
metaInfos.description: y coordinate for the atoms

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_atom_y_coord_initial
metaInfos.description: y coordinate for the atoms of the initial geometry

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_atom_z_coord
metaInfos.description: z coordinate for the atoms

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_atom_z_coord_initial
metaInfos.description: z coordinate for the atoms of the initial geometry

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_atomic_number
metaInfos.description: atomic number for atoms

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_basis_set_diffs
metaInfos.description: Incluse a set of S diffuse functions on light atoms or not

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_basis_set_diffsp
metaInfos.description: Include a set of SP diffuse functions on heavy atoms or not

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_basis_set_gbasis
metaInfos.description: Gaussian basis set main name

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_basis_set_igauss
metaInfos.description: Number of main Gaussians

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_basis_set_ndfunc
metaInfos.description: Number of polarization d function sets on heavy atoms

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_basis_set_nffunc
metaInfos.description: Number of polarization f function sets on heavy atoms

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_basis_set_npfunc
metaInfos.description: Number of polarization p function sets on light atoms

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_basis_set_polar
metaInfos.description: Exponents of polarization functions

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_beta_eigenvalues_values
metaInfos.description: values of eigenenergies for occupied beta MOs

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_cctype
metaInfos.description: Type of coupled cluster method employed

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_cis_excitation_energy
metaInfos.description: Value of the excitation energies for configuration interaction singles excited states.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_cis_oscillator_strength
metaInfos.description: Value of the oscillator strengths for configuration interaction singles excited states.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_cistep
metaInfos.description: Determinant or CSF method for multiconfigurational SCF calculation

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_citype
metaInfos.description: Type of configuration interaction method employed

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_comp_method
metaInfos.description: Control if the G3MP2 composite method has been defined

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_electronic_structure_method
metaInfos.description: Name of electronic structure method.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_energy_mcscf_iteration
metaInfos.description: Value of the MCSCF total energy, normally CASSCF, during the iterations.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_energy_scf
metaInfos.description: Final value of the total electronic energy calculated with the method described in xc_method.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_energy_total_scf_iteration
metaInfos.description: Value of the total electronic energy calculated with the method described in xc_method during each self-consistent field (SCF) iteration.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_frequencies
metaInfos.description: values of frequencies, in cm-1

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_frequency_values
metaInfos.description: values of frequencies, in cm-1

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_geometry_optimization_converged
metaInfos.description: Specifies whether a geometry optimization is converged.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_mcscf_active_electrons
metaInfos.description: Number of MCSCF active electrons in the calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_mcscf_active_orbitals
metaInfos.description: Number of MCSCF active orbitals in the calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_mcscf_casscf
metaInfos.description: This indicates whether the multiconfigurational SCF calculation is a complete active space SCF calculation or not

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_mcscf_inactive_orbitals
metaInfos.description: Number of MCSCF inactive orbitals in the calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_memory
metaInfos.description: Total memory for GAMESS job

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_method
metaInfos.description: String identifying in an unique way the WF method used for the final wavefunctions.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_mplevel
metaInfos.description: Level of second-orden Moller-Plesset perturbation theory

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_mrpt2_active_electrons
metaInfos.description: Number of active electrons in MRPT2 calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_mrpt2_active_orbitals
metaInfos.description: Number of active orbitals in MRPT2 calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_mrpt2_doubly_occupied_orbitals
metaInfos.description: Number of doubly occupied orbitals in MRPT2 calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_mrpt2_external_orbitals
metaInfos.description: Number of external orbitals in MRPT2 calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_mrpt2_frozen_core_orbitals
metaInfos.description: Number of frozen core orbitals in MRPT2 calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_mrpt2_frozen_virtual_orbitals
metaInfos.description: Number of frozen virtual orbitals in MRPT2 calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_mrpt2_method_type
metaInfos.description: Determinant (MRPT2) or CSF (MC-QDPT) method for second-order perturbation theory calculation

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_number_of_electrons
metaInfos.description: number of electrons for system

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_pptype
metaInfos.description: Name of the pseudopotential employed

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_red_masses
metaInfos.description: values of normal mode reduced masses

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_reduced_masses
metaInfos.description: values of normal mode reduced masses

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_relatmethod
metaInfos.description: Type of relativistic method employed

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_scf_hf_method
metaInfos.description: Type of SCF method employed.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_scf_method
metaInfos.description: String identifying in an unique way the SCF method used in the calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_scf_type
metaInfos.description: String identifying in an unique way the SCF method used in the calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_section_atom_forces
metaInfos.description: section that contains Cartesian forces of the system for a given geometry

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_section_ci
metaInfos.description: Configuration interaction energies.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_section_cis
metaInfos.description: Configuration interaction singles excitation energies and oscillator strengths.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_section_coupled_cluster
metaInfos.description: Coupled cluster energies.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_section_elstruc_method
metaInfos.description: Section containing electronic structure method.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_section_excited_states
metaInfos.description: Time-dependent DFT and configuration interaction singles results.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_section_frequencies
metaInfos.description: section for the values of the frequencies, reduced masses and normal mode vectors

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_section_geometry
metaInfos.description: section that contains Cartesian coordinates of the system for a given geometry

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_section_geometry_optimization_info
metaInfos.description: Specifies whether a geometry optimization is converged.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_section_mcscf
metaInfos.description: Multiconfigurational SCF energies.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_section_moller_plesset
metaInfos.description: Perturbative Moller-Plesset energies.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_section_mrpt2
metaInfos.description: Multiference multiconfigurational energies at second order of perturbation theory.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_section_scf_hf_method
metaInfos.description: Section containing type of SCF method employed (RHF,UHF,ROHF or GVB).

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_section_tddft
metaInfos.description: Time-dependent DFT excitation energies and oscillator strengths.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_spin_target_multiplicity
metaInfos.description: Target (user-imposed) value of the spin multiplicity $M=2S+1$, where $S$ is the total spin. It is an integer value. This value is not necessarly the value obtained at the end of the calculation. See spin_s2 for the converged value of the spin moment.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_tddft_excitation_energy
metaInfos.description: Value of the excitation energies for time-dependent DFT excited states.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_tddft_oscillator_strength
metaInfos.description: Value of the oscillator strengths for time-dependent DFT excited states.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_tddfttype
metaInfos.description: Type of time-dependent DFT calculation

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_total_charge
metaInfos.description: Total charge of the system.

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_vbtype
metaInfos.description: Type of valence bond method employed

metaInfos.name: x_gamess_xc
metaInfos.description: String identifying in an unique way the XC method used for the final wavefunctions.
